def_cn: （某一活动领域的）最前沿，最令人兴奋的发展阶段
def_en: If you are at the bleeding edge of a particular field of activity, you are involved in its most advanced or most exciting developments.

def_cn: （设备、技术）最先进的，尖端的
def_en: Bleeding-edge equipment or technology is the most advanced that there is in a particular field.
